Package station

Class PlusStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • station.Station
      • station.PlusStation
  • public class PlusStation
extends Station
    Class representing plus station. It is an extension of the station class that gives time credit to users who drop their bikes into its slots.

      Initializes PlusStation.

    • Method Detail

      • chargeUser

        public void chargeUser​(User usr,
                       double money,
                       long time_credit)
        Charges user and adds time credit. Overrides Station.chargeUser(User, double, long).
        Overrides:
        chargeUser in class Station
        Parameters:
        usr - User to be charged.
        money - Value to be charged of user.
        time_credit - Time credit to be removed from user's current credit balance.
